name: Quiver Shiver
description:
!!! NO CONTROLS INGAME!!

Each arrow only hurts a single enemy type

Draw arrow with right button, shoot with left mouse button

Pick up arrow with the E key

Beware the prices! Do you usually have tons of ammunition but no quiver!? What if you can have only one since you dont have money to buy a quiver? Then dont worry now! Because our lovely cheap price of few trojans and viruses will anwser all your answers! Simply with our newest bow for a lovely price of EXPENSIVE you wont have any money left to buy more arrows! Just go in the wild to hunt monsters and collect stuff on the ground who needs arrows anyways.

Programming by me

Art by Naku the Pun-isher

Sound effects by CzechLime
